dict.string: In 1984 Dr. Shankar joined the VA Healthcare System. She has been with the VA Palo Alto in Livermore since 1991, and works in the department of PM&R as a staff physician.

Dr. Shankar completed her medical school at University College of Medical Sciences in New Delhi in India in 1978. She did her residency in PM&R at Mount Sinai, Schwab Rehabilitation Center in Chicago, Illinois, including the last year as a chief resident.
Dr. Shankar is board certified in Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation as well as Electromyography. She is also a credentialed Acupuncturist. She is an affiliated faculty at Stanford Medical School.
